name: Avocado Bagel Toast
instructions:
Toast the mini bagels until golden brown.
Mash the avocado and spread it over the toasted bagels.
Spread cream cheese on the other half of the bagel.
Serve with a side of salted potato chips.

name: Spinach and Chicken Breakfast Sandwich
instructions:
Grill or pan-fry the chicken breast until fully cooked.
Slice the red onion and sauté until translucent.
Layer the chicken, sautéed onions, and spinach between the slices of bread.
Toast the sandwich until the bread is golden.

name: Tai Pei Orange Chicken with Broccoli
instructions:
Cook the Tai Pei Orange Chicken according to package instructions.
In the last 5 minutes of cooking, add the broccoli florets to steam.

name: Baked Salmon with Spinach
instructions:
Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
Place the salmon fillets on a baking tray and season with salt and pepper.
Bake for 15 minutes or until cooked through.
Sauté the spinach in a pan with a little oil until wilted.

name: Pork Chops with Veggie Mash
instructions:
Cook the pork chops on medium heat until browned and cooked through, about 6-8 minutes on each side.
Boil the carrot sticks and cauliflower until tender, about 10 minutes.
Drain and mash the carrots and cauliflower together with a bit of salt.
Sauté the fresh vegetable mix for about 3-4 minutes.
Serve the pork chops alongside the veggie mash and sautéed vegetables.
